entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 40%
